text: Sabine Lisicki was the defending champion but chose not to compete due to a left ankle injury. Samantha Stosur won the title, defeating Vera Zvonareva in the final 6–0, 6–3. ==Seeds== The top eight seeds receive a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Singles Family Circle Cup - Singles Category:Charleston Open
title: 2010 Family Circle Cup – Singles
